title: S4 Looking for serious duo or team
body: Hi guys, i finished my placement matches and ended up silver 4 and am keen and ready to smash duo queue or a team. I play pretty much every lane and have great game knowledge, have been playing since season 1 ! so please anyone thats serious would be great :) And this is my smurf account !

replies.body:
Sup main here, looking for a serious partner too! wanna climb hard and i can follow orders easy.

Aggressive play style 
love getting people fed and playing hard.

Mains are thresh braum and blitz i guess for sup 
yas main in the midlane

Add for more xx
Yo, chuck me an invite, I'm S5 atm, main top and jungle, also looking to climb.
Hey man I'm a jg main currently in s2 would love to duo and if you find a team would love to be apart of it ign Mikko Roblez

hey do you want to duo up
 iam looking to climb but still in bronze :)
